scripts.cy:e2e: npm run prereport; npm run cypress:run; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.cy:prod:smoke: npx cypress run --env configFile=prod --browser chrome --headed grepTags=smoke
scripts.cy:member:prod: npm run prereport; npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/specs/member.cy.js --env configFile=prod --browser chrome --headed; npm run posttest
scripts.cy:qa: CYPRESS_BASE_URL=https://staging.app.com npx cypress run --env configFile=qa --browser chrome --headed
scripts.cy:qa:smoke: CYPRESS_BASE_URL=https://staging.app.com npx cypress run --env configFile=qa --browser chrome --headed grepTags=smoke
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
